main event: A civilian observed a light resembling the size of a basketball in Fort Yukon, Alaska on December 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as a light that traveled on a steady course of 20 - 230 degrees,It ascended and descended rapidly before disappearing almost instantaneously,The observation lasted for 37 minutes,It was characterized as having the same appearance as a meteor,The weather during the observation was clear and cold.
sighted object: light the size of a basketball
